title: How to use iOS 17's 'Check In' feature, and why your loved ones will be glad you did
description: With the update to iOS 17, an alert can be sent to someone indicating that you've safely arrived at a specific destination.

title: Two divergent skills that matter in an AI world: Math and business development
description: For those seeking to get heavily immersed in building AI applications, it's time to shore up basic math skills. For those seeking more right-brained roles, business development skills are the top requirement.

title: What AI forgets could kill us, but new research is helping it remember
description: It's ironic: A better understanding how the human brain makes memories could help us to reduce neural networks' habit of 'catastrophic' forgetting.

title: Is AI lying to us? These researchers built an LLM lie detector of sorts to find out
description: When their output is false, large language models can be made to disclose the truth. Here's how.

title: BMW's wireless charging can destroy your iPhone 15
description: Yet another bug is affecting iPhone 15 owners, and this is a really odd one.

title: Gmail is getting emoji reactions. Here's how they will work
description: Why write an email reply when just a thumbs up or winking emoji will do?

title: Buy this Rosetta Stone and Microsoft Office bundle for only $200 now
description: Learn a new language and upgrade your office essentials with discounted access to Rosetta Stone and Microsoft Office for life.

title: Best VR headsets of 2023: Expert tested and reviewed
description: If you're ready to dive into virtual reality, look to these ZDNET-tested headsets to provide the most immersive, entertaining experiences money can buy.

title: This Kindle Scribe alternative offers an e-ink tablet with a great reading and writing experience
description: The $399 Kobo Elipsa 2E from Rakuten is terrific if you're a non-Amazon user or you're starting your e-book collection from scratch.

title: Get this security and risk management course bundle now for just $40
description: Learn new risk management skills over eight courses and gain your Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) credential now for 90% off.

title: ChatGPT's new web browsing feature is a big disappointment. Use this plugin instead
description: OpenAI's popular chatbot once again offers web browsing for premium users. Should you enable it? My tests were quite discouraging. Good thing there's a better option.

title: This absolute beast of a USB-C charger can power your whole desk
description: Ugreen's Nexode 300W charger is capable of powering your laptop, smartphone, tablet, and more.

title: Generative AI will far surpass what ChatGPT can do. Here's everything on how the tech advances
description: What does the future of generative AI hold? Multi-modality will move a primitive ChatGPT demo to interpersonal collaboration, advanced robotics -- and maybe even the AI dream of continuous learning.

title: Google's new premium Chromebook certification offers more than just bragging rights
description: If you already own an eligible Chromebook, you will soon be automatically upgraded to the Chromebook Plus Software experience. Here's what that means.

title: The iPhone 15 Pro has a weird USB-C charging problem
description: Tried charging your new iPhone 15 from a power bank but came back to a dead iPhone? You're not alone! Here's what's going on.

title: Ubuntu 23.10 seems like the usual boring update - until you dig into it
description: Ubuntu has been depending on baby steps to keep it moving forward. And although Mantic Minitaur might look as if it follows that pattern, there's more to it than meets the eye.

title: Apple says iPhone 15 overheating not a hardware issue, and a fix is coming
description: The iPhone maker promises the fix won't hurt performance.

title: Everything you need for commuting to work
description: From portable chargers to the best on-the-go work bags, ZDNET has you covered with everything you need to make your work commute on the train or bus easier and more enjoyable.
